name: ROLL!! Defender
description:
ROLL!! Defender is a game about rolling dice. It was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours.

In this game you have to defend you big ROLL!! button from incoming enemies. To do so, you can drag and drop your dice to cast various offensive or defensive abilities. 

By killing enemies you get gold, which you can use at the shop to buy better dice.

Fullscreen mode (bottom right on the player) is recommended.
